title: Saiunkoku Monogatari (avi, Xvid, DTV, complete)
description:
Main Title:  	Saiunkoku Monogatar
Official Title: 	The Story of Saiunkoku
Synonym: 	Colorcloud Palace, Colourcloud Palace, Story of the Land of Many-Colored Clouds, Tale of Saiunkoku, The Tale of Saiun Country
Type: 		TV Series, 39 episodes
Year: 		08.04.2006 till 24.02.2007
English Subtitles by: KissSub, ShadowDreams, Suck

Overview:
Born of an old, respected family in the land but subsisting on a low income, Shuurei accepts an invitation to become the new Emperor&#039;s concubine while believing that he is homosexual. The real purpose of her marriage is, however, to educate the lazy Emperor. Her close friend, Seiran, also enters the court as royal guard. Things get complicated when the characters unexpectedly develop feelings for each other.



Description from http://anidb.net/a4150

For playback/subtitle problems: http://cccp-project.net/ or http://smplayer.sourceforge.net/
